scripts.pretest: tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && tsc tests/*.ts tests/plugins/*.ts -t ES2017 --outdir tests/build --module commonjs
scripts.test-plugins: echo npm run pretest && tests/plugins/test-plugins.sh tests/build/tests/plugins/plugin-test.js
scripts.test-plugins-debug: echo not yet working npm run pretest && tests/plugins/test-plugins.sh -d tests/build/tests/plugins/plugin-test.js
scripts.test-plugins-watch: when-changed -k -1 -s tests/plugins/*.ts src/plugins/* -c npm run test-plugins
scripts.test-plugins-debug-watch: echo not yet working when-changed -k 1 -s tests/plugins/*.ts src/plugins* -c npm run test-plugins-debug
scripts.compile: riot chrome-extension/views/tags chrome-extension/views/tags/all.js && tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && tsc -p ./tsconfig.background.json && node bin/flatten-amd-modules.js chrome-extension/dist/background-amd.js chrome-extension/dist/background.js ; rm chrome-extension/dist/background-amd.js && tsc -p ./tsconfig.rnh-cs.json && node bin/flatten-amd-modules.js chrome-extension/dist/content-scripts/rnh-cs-amd.js chrome-extension/dist/content-scripts/rnh-cs.js; rm chrome-extension/dist/content-scripts/rnh-cs-amd.js && tsc -p ./tsconfig.frame-beacon.json && node bin/flatten-amd-modules.js chrome-extension/dist/content-scripts/frame-beacon-amd.js chrome-extension/dist/content-scripts/frame-beacon.js; rm chrome-extension/dist/content-scripts/frame-beacon-amd.js
